PermissionMenu.title: Custom Permission Configuration
PermissionMenu.disclaimer: Disclaimer: It is upon a module's programmers to use the permissions that they set up. If they do not use their own permissions, then there is nothing that the Permission Manager can do about it.

canEditPermissions.name: Configure Custom Permissions
canEditPermissions.hint: Allows users to configure the custom permission levels, including for roles that they don't have.
